description.p: Age. The lifespan of a shandari is unchanged.
Size. Your size is determined by your origin race.
Speed. Your speed is determined by your origin race.
Celestial Resistance. You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.
Magic Resistance. You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Weaving. You learn a cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it (choose when you select this race). You do not use spell slots or learn spells from leveling. Learning spells from Feats, Subclass features, or other means aside from leveling allows you to cast that spell an unlimited number of times per day, treating it as if it were a cantrip.

description.p: While the dragon blood that flows through your veins remains potent and powerful, it has been greatly changed by the influence of the Shandari upon your bloodline. Your appearance will shift due to your altered bloodline, often leading to strange scale patterns, partial absence of scales, or even a nighhuman appearance rather than a draconic visage, depending on the origin.

You gain the Draconic Ancestry and Breath Weapon racial features, but do not gain the Damage Resistance feature or any other racial features. Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and your size is Medium.

Dwarvish bloodlines are uncommon to see in the ranks of the Shandari, though not quite as rare as one might expect. Most dwarvish Shandari retain their dwarvish stature, though many find themselves without the natural resistances, cultural instruction, and visual acuity that their heritage might grant.
You gain the Dwarven Toughness racial feature. Your base walking speed is 25 feet, your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor, and your size is Medium.
Elven bloodlines are surprisingly open to the influence of the Shandari, though they retain much of the strange physiological changes brought upon them by the magic of the fey.
You gain the Fey Ancestry and Trance racial features of an elf. Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and your size is Medium.

Shandari of Gnomish heritage are surprisingly stable in the quirks of their bloodline, retaining their unusual curiosity and cheerful demeanor, as well as that special resistance to magical influence.

When you would fail a saving throw against a spell effect, you can choose to succeed instead. You can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest. Your base walking speed is 25 feet, and your size is Small.
